item.title: Get pretty org-bullets in Doom Emacs
item.description: When installing Doom Emacs and using org-mode the defaults bullets are *. In order to get some fancy bullets the following steps need to be taken. Add the org-mode +pretty flag to your org settings in init.el To read more on the available flags check the [org-mode Doom Emacs module lang/orgdoom-emacs-org-mode-flags :lang (org +pretty ) ; organize your plain life in plain text Set the bullets you want to use in your config.
